OOC: I hope I did this right, I had to type fast. 

ENJOY!! :)


BIC:

At the searing eye, to the casual observer it would be easy to see that
much in the way of construction has occurred. Even the large crater
that housed the main complex of buildings the once small group has
grown and connected, and they fairly glow with suppressed power. 

Large engines moved drilling down to the lunar core to extract the
energy located there, as panes of reflective material are directed at
the sun to collect the solar power that shines through the openness of
space. 

Within one of the buildings Cyclonus stood at the forefront of a vast
chamber, its doors were standing open to the current darkness of space,
stars winked and flickered in the distance. The walls of this chamber
are constructed from metal and stone. Large lights lit the area
brightly from above and along the walls, the faintly crimson hue of the
walls giving this room a slightly eerie feel as the light spills out
into the open air.

But rather than looking at the chamber itself he was standing with his
arms clasped behind his back looking out of the skies as he
contemplated the up coming event, a satisfied look on his face. 

Scourge walked up to stand next to him, "All things are in readiness
Cyclonus."

The minion herald nodded, "I have all the information that we need."

"What of the new ones that you created, will they be there as well?"
Scourge asked as he stood next to his commander and friend.

Cyclonus shook his head slightly, "Let us just say they have their own
mission to fulfill." Cyclonus glanced at Scourge, "If we need them, we
will have them in reserve."

Scourge nodded as he smiled eagerly. 

Cyclonus turned to look at the chamber and the large numbers of sweeps
that were entering it and for the first time in quite sometime he
smiled. Without turning he spoke to Scourge, "Give the order."

Scourge nodded and then stepped forward, "MINIONS OF UNICRON!"

The entire legion that paraded itself before them came to a stop, a
vast company of sweeps turned to the front in anticipation. 

"IT IS TIME TO TAKE TO THE AIR, TO ESTABLISH OURSELVES ON THIS PLANET
BELOW, TO MAKE THEM FEEL OUR WEIGHT, OUR MIGHT, TO MAKE THEM FEEL
FEAR!"

As one the sweeps came to a ready position as the stowed their weapons.


"MINIONS . . . TRANSFORM!!"

With a deafening sound all the sweeps shifted form as Scourge did the
same, hovering in mid air. "MINIONS . . .  TO THE AIR . . .  AND ON ...
TO ... VICTORYYYY!!!!"

With that Scourge moved higher into the skies as the large numbers of
sweeps headed into the blackness of space. 

Cyclonus, stood on the floor as he watched them take to the air, his
face beaming as he looked on. As the last one left the hanger and it
all became quiet he too took to the air, transformed with a flare of
tremendous power flew up and took his place at the head of the group. 

With a massive burst of power the host took flight, left the moon, and
like some black arrow of death moved toward the earth!
